about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

name: dagstermill
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  # source-of-truth
  version: 0.27.11
  python_max: '3.13'
  python_max_exclusive: '3.14'
  # package-specific
  # (pyspark <4 and great-expectations <1) require numpy <2, not built for python 3.13
  python_numpy1_max: '3.12'
  # derived
  patch_version: ${{ (version | split('.'))[2] }}
  dagster: dagster ==1.11.${{ patch_version }}
  # utility
  pip_install: -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

recipe:
  name: dagster-libs
  # the epoch is due to a historic issue with `conda-build` outputs
  # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-feedstock/issues/301
  version: 1!${{ version }}

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  # A
  - package:
      name: dagster-airbyte
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-airbyte/dagster_airbyte-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: f857bd38ba8a1e3859ecb80457412634e4e5f94b5970b8a6b13695a97cf9895e
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-airbyte = dagster_airbyte.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_airbyte
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-airbyte --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-airbyte
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Airbyte with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-aws
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-aws/dagster_aws-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a127d51b55088ebb91760d6dbcf1b8808b4b5eaffeee8563d53ae2d40e34eac7
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - boto3
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_aws
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-aws
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for AWS-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.
  # B
  # C
  - package:
      name: dagster-celery
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery/dagster_celery-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e5436739633670f1aa64c2e8fbd24e86d66e2da5217712f275403b7146b9be9b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-celery = dagster_celery.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - celery >=4.3.0
        - click >=5.0,<9
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-celery --help

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Celery as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-docker/dagster_celery_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 3ac03beced9409cb30fddcd433e9c98d0a0c169e89b983c390e3ab5833bb30b3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dagster-graphql
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_docker
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-k8s
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-k8s/dagster_celery_k8s-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 15fa9805af08f254b563e1f18a543df6554f6a10835e381d07f4f527d69f50ff
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-k8s", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_k8s
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-k8s
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-k8s-executor

  - package:
      name: dagster-census
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-census/dagster_census-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 440fb7c88f3ab69f8c71f4161019e550ec4889e76fd24dd9e5ea6373193432c3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_census
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-census
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Census with Dagster.

  # D
  - package:
      name: dagster-dask
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dask/dagster_dask-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 7724be57f5ba219c3094021c777907e2e4a242bc7842d4763e36fe8b73a3bdcc
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - bokeh
        - dask >=1.2.2
        - distributed >=1.28.1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dask
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dask
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Dask as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-datadog
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-datadog/dagster_datadog-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 81c1cf65387a1ca5edcda4ddccdffd6283cafb322213384f730fc606cc93ca71
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - datadog
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_datadog
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-datadog
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for datadog Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dbt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 2a77e9f47bfeee36b7f30a85a5cf0e1ed818cd0f1ad1b05c1ca59a817cae0d0a
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud = dagster_dbt.cloud.cli:app
          - dagster-dbt = dagster_dbt.cli.app:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        # see https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt/dbt_core_version.py
        - dbt-core >=1.7,<1.11
        - jinja2
        - networkx
        - orjson
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-dateutil
        - requests
        - rich
        - sqlglot-rs
        - typer >=0.9.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dbt
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud --help
          - dagster-dbt --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dbt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for dbt

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake/dagster_deltalake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c06e555e9da309b20b5fba1d160084b03e84384881eaeb588a497eefed231ae3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - deltalake >=0.25.0,<1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Deltalake-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-pandas/dagster_deltalake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 07f91b7d46aabc1e2897d6f17c9a0cb04c7d8e6027177a036c48c13564ed670b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in Delta tables

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-polars/dagster_deltalake_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 8de652ffec94456b5926c29e5435783e07ae9f79dfad23a2fc2a5ad8aa2eae45
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: update after https://github.com/conda-forge/polars-feedstock/issues/194
        # for now https://github.com/pola-rs/polars/blob/main/py-polars/pyproject.toml#L52C13-L52C29
        - pyarrow >=7.0.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in Delta tables.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dlt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dlt/dagster_dlt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 2a7b988c2d34e6e16c290d3cb1badd6cad820107b8f4715a148b120652dce23b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - dlt >=0.4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_dlt
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-dlt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: This library provides a Dagster integration with dlt

  - package:
      name: dagster-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-docker/dagster_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c168cf33d2b6adc91e96edf5713b257362c0c6574bfb531e429f69c54b64e8af
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - docker-image-py
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_docker
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb/dagster_duckdb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a8fe1a86ac2e720bd38c4dc146f4880464b670e5abba8adb86f921fa088b7567
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-duckdb
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for DuckDB-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pandas/dagster_duckdb_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: b51bdd60f446a415c67726e4f3699dfae4c3cd51c85a2a210b7ed229c79a352e
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-polars/dagster_duckdb_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a1a6b12e3125d55f1876c86f982df9c3aa3bbc06c03994a9546c4814dbe49547
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyarrow >=4.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: get polars-with-X outputs
        - polars
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in DuckDB.
  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pyspark/dagster_duckdb_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ced114a3e4b1961957944e8d2350ea020ea83c4cd16074b66e1bc2df82607365
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - pyarrow
        - pyspark >=3,<4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            # TODO: replace with python_max when pyspark >=5
            - ${{ python_numpy1_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in DuckDB.

  # E
  # F
  - package:
      name: dagster-fivetran
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-fivetran/dagster_fivetran-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 11a31ac37536a67544faf56563484b311c99c8f22c4014f1ccaa6e4f8231f5e2
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-fivetran = dagster_fivetran.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_fivetran
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-fivetran --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-fivetran
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Fivetran with Dagster.

  # G
  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp/dagster_gcp-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: bf7de98ae4424867218390774b571a6a59c61046a2a744af2f99d180aba0e639
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - db-dtypes
        - google-api-python-client
        - google-cloud-bigquery-core >=1.28.3
        - google-cloud-storage
        - oauth2client
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp
            - dagster_gcp.bigquery
            - dagster_gcp.dataproc
            - dagster_gcp.gcs
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for GCP-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.

      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Snowflake Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-spark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-spark/dagster_spark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: d99a43a496695bb36aebbc4c0e2e03ac96454f5495d50bbe26dd257913a2e84c
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_spark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-spark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pandas/dagster_snowflake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e74defdd264500dcc7c44a8afb784a1b9f5ba3709cb9bca444dac5a8900ebc89
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-connector-python >=2.1.0
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy >=1.2
        - sqlalchemy !=1.4.42
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and Pandas with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pyspark/dagster_snowflake_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 999253746a20bf643a9309b20d93c1cd60d1e86920b11de7837d70d06aa76a61
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark <4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            # TODO: replace with python_max when pyspark >=5
            - ${{ python_numpy1_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and PySpark with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-ssh
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ssh/dagster_ssh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 6011863cda21416c250a9fc8ccdd5ef62902916d7e5ba9739761a0d8dfcf4aa8
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - paramiko
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sshtunnel
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_ssh
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-ssh
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for ssh Dagster framework components.

  # T
  - package:
      name: dagster-tableau
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-tableau/dagster_tableau-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 4b238f1d9302a7de0df40a91d553ddf21f0cad0a40a61d1a03b1564c74feba02
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - pyjwt
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - tableauserverclient >=0.32
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_tableau
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-tableau
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Tableau workbooks and sheets.

  - package:
      name: dagster-twilio
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-twilio/dagster_twilio-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 0e6ac4d46ec24f8760852fc27c4b0ea5bdca900ebfbbe0b090cc897cc7edaf25
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - twilio
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_twilio
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-twilio
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for twilio

  # U
  # V
  # W
  - package:
      name: dagster-wandb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-wandb/dagster_wandb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 0cb44b9b5bbc2b6526d4aeb0346859db7bc71933cefd00883791df1758b19a17
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - wandb >=0.15.11,<1.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_wandb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-wandb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for wandb Dagster components.

  # X
  # Y
  # Z

  # not hyphenated

  - package:
      name: dagstermill
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagstermill/dagstermill-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 26207cd77f7c7eb469d8d2a513905d4802eb8786f44b1fc7b5b5f1ef64629efb
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagstermill = dagstermill.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ipykernel >=4.9.0,!=5.4.0,!=5.4.1
        - ipython_genutils >=0.2.0
        - jupyter_client <8
        - nbconvert
        - packaging >=20.9
        - papermill >=1.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - scrapbook >=0.5
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagstermill
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagstermill --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagstermill
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for papermill

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  documentation: https://docs.dagster.io
  description: >-
    Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

extra:
  feedstock-name: dagster-libs
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - conda-forge/dagster
